snippet: If it is successful, the show could become a template for future joint projects.
abstract: Media Decoder blog; TED, nonprofit group that sponsors conferences on ideas, joins with Corporation for Public Broadcasting and New York public broadcaster WNET for TED Talks Education, one-hour special to be aired on PBS.
lead_paragraph: If it is successful, the show could become a template for future joint projects.

headline.seo: TED Teams Up With PBS for Education Program
headline.main: TED Teams Up With PBS on Ideas for Education
headline.print_headline: TED Teams Up With PBS On Ideas for Education
